info.description:
Rating API, uses Glicko2 rating algorithim. feel free to contact me for a permenant api token
Public Bearer token:
info.title: RaterApi

tags.name: match
tags.description: Matches of a game you already created, auto generates user if they didn't exist

tags.name: user
tags.description: Users of your games, they get auto-generated by creating matches of them playing with default rating 1500

get.description: Return all games, will return empty body if there was none

post.description: Create a game so you can arrange matches for your own users

patch.description: Can update game name only for now

401.description: Invalid or no api token, authorize with a valid api please

delete.description: Hard delete a game, matches of the game will be deleted as well, Users rating or statistics WILL NOT BE AFFECTED

parameters.name: gameSlug
parameters.description: Game slug to delete the game

get.description: Get all users relevant data to the selected game
Get a certain user data relevant to the selected game

get.summary: return all matches played in selected game
get.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities

parameters.name: gameSlug
parameters.description: Slug of game you want to get matches from, it will return empty values if there were no matches

post.description: Create a new match for the selected game

parameters.name: gameSlug
parameters.description: Slug of game you want to get matches from, it will return empty values if there were no matches

parameters.name: teams
parameters.description: SEND 2 TEAMS(object) EXACTLY in "teams" array, can be just 2 teams of a single player each, result must be 1, 0 or 0.5

401.description: Invalid or no api token, authorize with a valid api please

get.description: Get a certain match from the selected game

delete.description: Delete a match that got played in one of your games

get.description: Return all users, will return empty body if there was none

parameters.name: userSlug
parameters.description: Slug of the username that needs to be fetched(ex: John-doe)

delete.description: Delete a user, that will result on matches record, but it will not affect ratings of other players

get.summary: Get games played by a user
get.description: Get all user's games, it will return empty data only if you delete the games user used to play

get.summary: Get matches played by a user
get.description: Get all user's matches, it will return empty data only if you delete the games user used to play
